mapper.sql: id, file_id, meta_data_id, meta_data_name, `status`, publish_time, remarks, industry, rec_create_time, rec_update_time,data_token_id,`owner`,meta_data_type
mapper.select: select lmd.*, ifnull(t.task_count,0) as task_count from local_meta_data lmd left join ( select meta_data_id, count(task_id) task_count from task_data_provider GROUP BY meta_data_id) t on lmd.meta_data_id = t.meta_data_id where lmd.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT lmd.*, ldf.size, ifnull(t.task_count,0) as task_count, dt.name as data_token_name,dt.symbol as data_token_symbol FROM local_meta_data lmd join local_data_file ldf on lmd.file_id = ldf.file_id left join ( select meta_data_id, count(task_id) task_count from task_data_provider GROUP BY meta_data_id) t on lmd.meta_data_id = t.meta_data_id left join data_token dt on lmd.data_token_id = dt.id where lmd.status != 4 and lmd.`owner` = #{userAddress}
and lmd.status in (8,9,10)
and lmd.status in (0,1,2,3,5,6,7)
and lmd.meta_data_name like concat('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY lmd.rec_create_time desc
select from local_meta_data where meta_data_name = #{resourceName} and status != 4
mapper.update: update local_meta_data set file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meta_data_id = #{metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meta_data_name = #{metaDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach: update local_meta_data set status = #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publish_time = #{item.publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_update_time = #{item.recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where meta_data_id = #{item.metaDataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6)
